properties.comment: Used as the background color for the active state on rows or items on list-like components.
properties.name: colorBackgroundRowActive

properties.comment: Light variant of COLOR_BACKGROUND.
properties.name: colorBackgroundLight

properties.comment: Used as the background color for the hover state on rows or items on list-like components.
properties.name: colorBackgroundRowHover

properties.comment: Background color for UI elements related to providing neutral information (not error, success, or warning).
properties.name: colorBackgroundInfo

properties.comment: Used as background for loading stencils on white background.
properties.name: colorBackgroundStencil

properties.comment: Default background color for the whole app.
properties.name: colorBackground

properties.comment: Light variant of COLOR_BACKGROUND.
properties.name: colorBackgroundDark

properties.comment: Used as an alternate background for loading stencils on gray backgrounds.
properties.name: colorBackgroundStencilAlt

properties.comment: Used as the background color for selected rows or items on list-like components.
properties.name: colorBackgroundRowSelected

properties.comment: Default border color for UI elements.
properties.name: colorBorder

properties.comment: Lightest separator color - used as default separator on white backgrounds.
properties.name: colorBorderSeparator

properties.comment: Medium separator color - used as default separator on light gray backgrounds.
properties.name: colorBorderSeparatorAlt

properties.comment: Darkest separator color - used as an alternate separator color when more differentiation is desired.
properties.name: colorBorderSeparatorAlt2

properties.comment: Border color for UI elements related to providing neutral information (not error, success, or warning).
properties.name: colorBorderInfo

properties.comment: Border color for UI elements related to the offline state.
properties.name: colorBorderOffline

properties.comment: Used to delineate the boundary of a component that is being clicked. Specific to builders.
properties.name: colorBorderSelectionActive

properties.comment: Input placeholder text on dark backgrounds.
